website_summaries.verdict: A mid-calf boot that looks and feels great yet is also practical for winter wear in inclement conditions.
pros: Stylish boots that are warm without looking bulky
Deep tread provides dependable traction for walking in ice and snow
cons: A few felt this style ran on the small or tight side
Occasional issues with seams and threads coming loose noted

customer_reviews.title: comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad there was a wide width selection!! I originally ordered these as a9M, the length was perfect but they were way too tight! I sent them back and ordered wide, they came today and they feel absolutely perfect! I'll update my review in a few weeks if they don't hold up to a central NY winter, but hopefully they will. Only wish I have would have been a Navy option for the wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and I really like them. What sets these apart from the usual Bearpaws is the soles have some traction which make them better and less slippery in a small amount of snow and they are water repellent which make them better in rain and large amounts of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: love this new style!
customer_reviews.text: love these boots! I wear sz 8 and purchased sz 8...perfect fit! The Charcoal color is pretty and will go with lots of leggings/jeans. This style has a different profile than some of my other bearpaw boots- they arent as round & bulky on the top of my foot but have a more contoured slimmer look and the toe isnt quite as wide (but its wide enough and toes arent scrunched up by any means) ...I like this new style alot. I love my other bearpaws as well but these are a nice change. They arrived on time and packaging was great!
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Great color,  great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love Bearpaws. Have been wearing for years. I found this particular boot however, to fit a bit snug. BUT I would encourage you to still buy your normal size because after a few days of wearing, the suede material does stretch out. Warm inside as is standard with Bearpaw. Definitely stands up to its promise of being water repellent. I went out in a major snowstorm in the Burgundy. I stopped in snow and slush. The boot held up very well. I have since mucked up the appearance of the boot due to my own carelessness, but the boot is as promised. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: McDiven

customer_reviews.title: Run small an narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of the Elle bearpaws. This is the first time I have bought a pair that wasn’t from the bearpaw site. This boot looks very nice. The color is right on. They do run smaller and they are very narrow. They are not as warm as my other ones, the fur around the foot is very thin. The ones I already had have thick fur lining all the way to the toes. I wear a size 7 an I bought an 8 and they fit snug. For the price I paid they are definitely worth it. The boots from bearpaw website are better made without doubt but more $$
customer_reviews.author: Oobash

customer_reviews.title: Bear paw boots never wet
customer_reviews.text: Love this product wore on a rainy day already and my feet stayed dry was a little small for the size of your unsure of size order up half size love the color and the rubber tread on the bottom it’s a great quality product would order again
customer_reviews.author: Mary h.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot, I liked the look and feel except ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot, I liked the look and feel except they were just a little too small and they do not come in half sizes so going up to the next size was too big. Had to return them:(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Napua

customer_reviews.title: they lie about the color
customer_reviews.text: The image shows a winter white. The description says white. They have altered the color of the photograph. These boots are tan. The are not white. They are not beige. They are not even sand colored. They are tan. Uk.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love the light blue, boot fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first pair cause there was a little hot glue mark, visible on the light blue shoe especially in brighter light. Got easy replacement and they are just right. I usually get 7’s in boots and it fit as expected with a little wiggle room for thick socks when the fur flattens inside a little. Never had bearpaws but they are nice, no where near UGG quality and softness though. They seem to have a good bottom sole, I can walk on ice and snow without slipping like some slipper boots do.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! True to size (size up if in between). Authentic Bearpaw. Arrived quickly despite the expected date of delivery. There was a chemical scent to the boots, but that disappeared in a few days. So happy with the price and delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boots, but order a half-size up
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these constantly this past winter, they have easily become my favorite winter boots. I have another pair of wonderful Bearpaw snow boots that have only one con: they're a tad short. I almost always order my usual size of 9 for all types of shoes, but for these boots I took a chance and ordered a half size up, and they fit perfectly (with or without socks). These boots are warm, comfortable, and repel light snow and water easily. I still wear my snow boots for heavy snow but the Elle short winter boots are my go-to boot for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: All over the place
customer_reviews.text: I bought and sent back 3 separate pairs of these for my daughter. The sizing was ALL over the place, purchased a size bigger and they were tighter than the first pair, third pair was just as bad. If your going to outsource these from many locations have a standard sizing for all of them. Extremely Disappointed and wont purchase again. For those of you that your boots actually fit I'm glad you had better luck than we did.
customer_reviews.author: Kryme2sleep

customer_reviews.title: Refusal to exchange for correct size.
customer_reviews.text: Right after I received these boots, my husband ended up in the hospital with a very serious injury. He is still there. By the time I opened the box and tried on the boots the 30 day return period had expired. The vendor refuses to do an exchange so I am stuck with boots that I love but are huge, thus I cannot wear them. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Karlson

customer_reviews.title: 'Tan smooth' are vinyl and fake fur
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in, took one look and put them right back in the box. I didn't try them on as they weren't even worth the effort of removing and replacing the stuffing. I ordered the tan smooth and they are vinyl with fake fur inside. It's not even good vinyl, it's so obviously fake. Not worth $60, as I could find vinyl and fake fur at Wal-Mart. The suede may be real, but skip the 'tan smooth'. The description doesn't mention man made upper anywhere. Back they go....
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love rhese boots.
customer_reviews.text: I always love these Bear Paw boots. As good as Uggs for much less. This is my fourth pair. They fit well and are very comfortsble and last forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kirst

customer_reviews.title: Love the traction! No more slipping on ice and snow
customer_reviews.text: Love this new style! The treads are so much better for winter weather than the other styles. I feel like I have so much traction and the treads are thicker so I think the boot will be more protected from water. Does have a strong chemical or factory smell, but it may be whatever was put on to protect from water. Once they air out, I’m sure the smell will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Deuso

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This boot is supposed to be the genuine shearling version of Bear Paws. Well.....I'm sending it back. Not plush at all. This is the third pair that I have purchased (I use these to wear around my old drafty home). I don't wear these outdoors unless it's to the curb and back. The footbed feels like it just has a layer of some sort of fabric (assuming it's genuine shearling or wool. Not thick and fluffy like the other styles that had more material. Those were better and I am returning these for a faux fur option in Bear Paws.
customer_reviews.author: shoe fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I ordered my normal size of 8 and they fit perfect. They're ridiculously soft, comfy and keep my feet warm. I ordered the charcoal ones and love the color. They match well with my clothes. Wish I wouldn't have waited so long to order.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wear 81/2 in everything and these fit great in my regular size. I have Emma +Elle boots the Elle style fit is better for my back. Emma is a loose wide fit (size8) hard to walk in for me, no support hurts my back. Just comparing the two styles. I also love that they come water repellent treated.
customer_reviews.author: Sancho’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Warm and well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched forever to replace my old U** knock offs. These are wonderful boots for a wonderful price. I usually wear 8.5 and I bought a 9. There is a little room for thicker socks, but no way I could have gone with an 8. The lining is super thick and the lug sole is great. I got the beautiful plum color and thinking of buying another one in a green or blue. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: J K C W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looove these... I purchase Bearpaw because they do fit snugger than most, which means my feet stay warmer on colder days. These are super comfy, and my toes always stay toasty
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought the 9 but it was slightly too small. After wearing these for awhile I wonder if the 9 would have fit after a few wears, but I will just add another layer of the sheepskin inserts or wear thicker socks. I used to wear the Emma style but they didn't hold up very well with regular wear even though I loved them. These have a more durable feeling bottom sole. They got me through one winter season so far and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Threads are coming undone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my grand daughter for Christmas. She wore them a couple of times and then the threading started to come undone. I have reached out to the seller, they will not do an exchange or return. My grand daughter has reached out to Bearpaw.com and they warranty their boots for a year. We will be going that route. I have purchased Bear paw boots many times for my family members through department stores and have not had any issues. This will be the last time I purchase boots/shoes from Amazon or its sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet for winter!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are warm, but don't make your feet sweat or overheat. They are very comfortable. The go on easily, and my feet don't slide around in them. I was thrilled to finally find boots in wide sizes. I wear a 6.5 w usually, but sometimes need a 7, so I bought a 7w. They are roomy, but not too big. They have good traction in the snow and ice. I will buy another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Bearpaw boots!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing my black suede Bearpaw boots since 2013, so when my daughter asked for a black pair for her birthday I jumped on it. I got her the black smooth pair and I was pleased to see that the inner lining was also black fur instead of cream fur like the suede ones I have. The only thing I didn't like was the etch marks (looks like some type of machine was pressed against it) around the sides near the bottom of the boot where the stitching is. I didn't have time to return them before her surprise party, but she's happy. She especially likes the smooth leather!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Just love these boots! ! !
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Bearpaw boots that I've bought. I own Uggs, but still prefer this brand, especially with the price difference. The Bearpaw are always a perfect fit; endure endless torture from me and still look good. Won't go back to another brand after Bearpaw. They look good, fit well and are durable. What else is there?
customer_reviews.author: BouvierChick

customer_reviews.title: Favorite winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest winter boots I've ever owned. I don't even bust these out until it's 20 degrees or cooler, or my feet will sweat! They're super comfy and thick. My usual size 8 fit perfectly. The ones I had last year got a little raggedy looking after wearing them so much, so I got a new pair this year!
customer_reviews.author: LoveOlivia

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit smaller but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't own one of these. I had to return my very first order of size 7.5M because it's too tight and felt like they're squeezing my feet. I wear a size 7.5 and occasionally a size 7. My replacement order came a day early which was a plus and this time size 8M is perfect with enough room for thicker socks. The inside of the boots have ample cushion and feels so warm and comfortable. I got the Black Never-Wet technology so I have to see how they hold up later with rain or getting wet, hence the 4 stars I gave. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R

customer_reviews.title: Boots have overpowering fish smell...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7.5 in the earth antique color and they're cute enough. I wanted plain grey- brown boots but these have a golden shimmer. The shimmer I could overlook, but these boots SMELL HORRIBLE! I took put them in my closet and came in a while later to an awful, over powering fish-type smell all throughout my bedroom. Manufacturing, plastic, packaging type smells are obviously expected and they fade with time, but these things reek. I'm probably setting myself up for some bad jokes here, but there's no way I'm wearing these in public or even keeping them in my house. I'll be returning them today and buying something in person that passes the sniff test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was too small, although I had tried on a friend’s boot in a similar style and size before ordering. I couldn’t get it on my feet. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BSH

customer_reviews.title: I tromp around the house all day in these boots ...
customer_reviews.text: I tromp around the house all day in these boots . I did insert a cushioned foot pad for personal comfort. But even with that added expense ,they were half the price of the UGGS I had worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Sense

customer_reviews.title: Elle running larger than Ella
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Emma short and tall boots in an 8, but had to return these for a 7.5. Those fit perfect. I have lean feet and narrow heels and the Elle seems to have a larger heel for sure. Hoping they last a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: TKCHIC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pair my daughter's boots already has a split on the inside, while nothing has gone wrong with mines she is angry because it happened on day 32 of her wearing it and she couldn't exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I buy a pair of bear paw boots every year as slippers. The ones I just bought have more of an outdoor sole so I can wear them outside. I only rated a 3 on support because these are like slippers. They don't have the big arch support I like in shoes however I wear them daily in the house, not for long walks. I love bear paw boots.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bear Paws
customer_reviews.text: I love Bear Paw boots , great value for the money and not as thick and heavy as an ugg boot so I like them better .. ordered this color and it’s beautiful light and creamy beige not too yellow .. I am size 8 but always order a 9 in these boots and they fit perfect.. I have them in gray , black , wine , beige.. great with leggings and a tunic or a jacket ..
customer_reviews.author: Best Life

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I think these boots are great! So glad I went with the wide. They fit perfectly and are so comfy. I scotch guarded these and use them to run errands. I live in Wisconsin and we have alot of snow in winter and they're holding up great. My feet never get wet or cold. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Best bearpaw boot I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I use these boots daily. I like that they have a harder rubber sole unlike the Abigail style boot; those only latest a season at most, which is disappointing. The Eli boots are comfortable and the shaft fit my wider calfs. The lining inside is so warm and soft. The trend on the bottom is wonderful in snow I don't feel as though I'm going to slip every step I take. This style will be my new go to for winter casual day to day footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my boots
customer_reviews.text: I like that the sole isn't the kind that tends to split (the decorated kind). Great suede. As for the fit I ordered a half size up and it worked out great. Had to send back the taller Bearpaw boot that I ordered previously because they ran small. Glad these didn't have that issue! And they were cheaper. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My Mom loves her new boots
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots, I wish they came in my size. I usually wear size 8, I bought size 9 because the last pair I bought was an 8, and I had to return them. I thought the size 9 should fit, it was about a half size too small. Luckily for my Mom they fit her perfectly. She loves her new boots.
customer_reviews.author: annette squires

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looking boot! Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot! I went back and forth between this one and the “Emma”, looking at the difference in soles. I really like the look of this boot, fits great, is not loose on my calves, very warm. If you have bigger calves, it might be tight. I have no trouble sliding my foot right in. I wear a 7, and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Martin

customer_reviews.title: I was after the particular pair of boots for WEEKS ...
customer_reviews.text: I was after the particular pair of boots for WEEKS - I must have checked every possible store in my location and they were consistently sold out. It's because these boots are it. They are cute and they are comfy. I wear them ALL THE TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Geroux

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really love them so far! I usually wear an 8.5/9 and I ordered a 9. They fit great. They're very warm, and I love the charcoal color. Much more affordable than Uggs. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable boots with nice lug sole, so much better for traction. They do run on the larger side. (1/2-1 whole size larger) Not intended for wearing with socks so if you’re planning on doing some winter socks they might be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots that have kept me warm (I don't wear socks with them) and dry. So far the weather has been in the low teens with some snow. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: Sooo comfy. My feet are wide across the toes and I have had difficulty buying shoes/boots because of this. So I was hesitant to place the order but with Amazon's return policy I decided "what do I have to lose". I am so glad that I did! They fit like a dream. I have worn them several times for a half a day or more with no problems. Just toasty warm feet. Make sure to pretreat (scotchguard) before wearing outside.
customer_reviews.author: cookiemom

customer_reviews.title: BEARPAW Women's Elle Short Winter Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are my absolute favorite and go to for fall and winter. I bought my first pair about 11 years ago and they held up great all these years. I always buy my winter boots in the summer because the prices are amazing. So take a chance and try them! You will love them. I always water proof mine once a year.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say it's BearPaw
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's BearPaw I knew they'd be good I sprayed with water resistant spray to keep stains off and now I know I will get years of wear they are my 2 nd pair I wore out the first pair after 5 years I call that good .
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dunmire

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but NARROW fit
customer_reviews.text: Narrow fit- so if you require a wider fit these unfortunately will "not" work- they are awesome boots, good quality, however, they are narrow and do not give way at all- gave them as a gift since I could not use them myself! :)
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of Bearpaw boots I have ever owned and I couldn’t be happier. They are the warmest boots I have ever had on my feet and the most comfortable. I am very pleased with them and will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina M Findley

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I researched this type boot for several months. Many were more expensive and some were less. This got the best reviews. I love these boots! Depending on brand, I wear 7.5 or 8. Based on other reviews I went with the 7.5 and it’s a great fit. They look great and are very warm and cozy. These have a nice tread as well which I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: LoriMc

customer_reviews.title: Blister!
customer_reviews.text: Too small, and after just 10 minutes of walking in them (without socks because they're too small to wear with socks) I got a nasty blister on the back of my foot. There was a really rough patch the back of my foot was rubbing against.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, keeps my feet warm & waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. they fit great with socks on, keeps my feet and legs warm, and they are waterproof. walked in snow in these, and socks stayed dry and they are so comfortable to wear. will definitely recommend this boot to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Color was more green tinted than picture showed. Wear is showing up quicker than my precious bear paws have shown. Got them in oct and wear nearly daily as I have all bear paws I’ve purchased in the past. These just seem to be wearing out faster than others. But over all for the price they are awesome books that allow me to have the UGG look without the price tag. Very warm and comfortable. So far my feet have stayed dry even in snow and light rain.
customer_reviews.author: jamzjen

customer_reviews.title: Like slippers but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove! I’m normally an 8.5 wide, and I got the 9. My calves are on the wider side but no issue with the fit on these 8 in tall “short” boots. I think they came pre treated but I’m going to scotch guard them anyway. Bring on the cold! My feet won’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: love the blue!!
customer_reviews.text: i usually wear a 7 1/2 or 8 in shoes and i got the 7 for perfect! they are more blue green than the picture but they feel and fit amazing! i love them for a fraction of the price of uggs.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.D

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I loved that I could find a pair of these in womens 13 as this size is difficult to find. Thank you for carrying this size! They are comfortable. They are not waterproof so I purchased some water proofing spray and that has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Kuusisto

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfy, and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for when I go camping this summer. Couldn't of asked for a better pair of boots like this, and they are coated with the never wet so it's water resistant. Very well made and great material. Made with lamb's skin. I would say with mild- excessive wear, it should last me at least 2 years. I do recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering odor water repellant treatment
customer_reviews.text: Such a very strong odor off these boots that smells like water repellent treatment as soon as I open the box I had to leave them outside for several days otherwise they fit well
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: They run Slightly small so I ordered up for my daughter. My daughter loves these. I might buy me another pair a size up and give her my white ones which are more of a cream color but I Love that color!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Harig

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Bear Paws. Followed the size guide. This is my first day wearing them. I am only into 1/2 the day and have found these to be the MOST uncomfortable boots I have ever worn !!! I live with winter weather for many months and while these are warm, they are stiff and not very supportive of the foot. Hope to return . Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This boot is so beautiful and is so warm with fluff in the inside. The color is beautiful, and the fit was perfect. I will be ordering so many more but different colors. So so happy with theses boots..
customer_reviews.author: BBKay

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love Bearpaw boots I ordered a size up because I used to sell boots and u always have to order a size up because the padding inside takes up the extra size and they are perfect . We get up to 6feet of snow and these keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: alesia jones

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: It took me forever to get her to buy these boots and once she put them on, she does not want to take them off. The most comfortable boots she has ever owned and nothing has kept her feet warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mccauley

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Toes
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear socks. My feet are warm in freezing temperatures. There's no arch support. But the boots are wide enough where I put in an orthotic and my feet are still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kamkaisakhut Severe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the Bearpaw brand without the UGG price. Bought these in black 3 months ago,,sprayed with suede boot waterproof spray and they fit and last just as good as Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Green Ones!
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of Bearpaw boots, tall, medium, and short, and they have all fit well and seem to wear well. I have looked for this color for several years & was happy to find it at last.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Russell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable Like them just as much as my UGHS for half the price Ordered a gray pair from Lands End Same boot but 20$ more!! Just FYI They say waterproof but then recommend to spray with water repellent A little deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Mousie1

customer_reviews.title: May be tight on larger calves
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair. Tighter than the previous generation on my ankle and lower calf. Doable, but would have liked them a little bigger. I do have large bones, but not excessively large calves. If you do these may be to tight.
customer_reviews.author: ASM_ME

customer_reviews.title: Very Tight Calf
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these because, while they were beautiful and seemed to be well made and even fit my foot well, the ankle/calf was so small it crinkled up and gave my leg a muffin top. If you're a bigger person like me find something with a lower calf or a wide calf.
customer_reviews.author: ESM

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? They arrived before the date promised, are warm and comfortable and look great with jeans and leggings. They do run a tad small. I went by the chart and went up a half size. You might want to go up a full size if you'll be wearing heavy socks.
customer_reviews.author: JMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Stiff at first but definitely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and I absolutely love the glitter! So beautiful. They are very stiff until you get them worn in but I do love them. Have good traction so you don’t slip and fall. Would definitely purchase again and this is actually my second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than tan version, but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrower and tighter in the calf than the exact same boots I have in tan. That being said, they are holding up much better. Not so tight they don’t work, just take a bit more effort to put on and eat my socks when I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Boynton

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping due to color
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but color was too gray. Was looking for more white or ivory
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, warm and comfortable boots. I am usually 8.5 in shoes and that was the size i got In brown color. Comparing them with their counter part UGGS, this last ones are a little big softer in the inside and outside, but for the price and overall quality BEARPAW is the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of these boots, I love bearpaw more than uggz. Just get a half or whole size bigger than your size. I would put 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm love
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new boots. So comfortable and warm they just hug my foot. I'm usually at 8 and a half or 9 and I went with the nine and they fit perfect. I want more in different colors
customer_reviews.author: kristinM

customer_reviews.title: Better than uggs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought a women’s size even though she’s a size 4 kids. Fit great with a a little extra space and very comfortable. Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Had a pair just like them that I wore for years. Super comfy and warm. Only thing I thought was strange was on the inside the bottom where your foot sits is a light pinkish color, and thinner. The rest of inside was black fur. My old pair was black fur on the inside completely.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: Would be comfortable if...
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is with the left boot. The stitching where the shaft of the boot meets with bottom portion is raised (not like the right). It blistered my ankle. Didn't realize the problem until I wore them most of the day. I am going to get something to cover the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! SUPER WARM AND COMFY! DON'T FORGET TO WATERPROOF!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with these boots. I needed to boots so bad and was hesitant to buy online. I was pleasantly surprised and couldn't be happier. Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: a little snug with bare feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 1/2 so I get 11 in boots for extra room. These are snug with no socks. but I hope the stretch out a bit with wear cause I love them.😊
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Fits Wide Calves - Stunning Color
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and warm. Great depth of color makes for superb neutral without being boring. Fit my wide calves and easy to take off. I'd eagerly buy another pair of Bearpaws when the time comes to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Warm boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm and comfortable. I am usually a size 8 in boots and regular shoes. I am 8.5 in running shoes. I don't think I could wear these with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia Sewall

customer_reviews.title: Two 👍🏽👍🏽for Bearpaw!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Perfect fit. Love the Wine color. Tempted to get another pair (maybe brown). Equal quality with another brand at a fraction of the cost. I’m thoroughly satisfied. 😁
customer_reviews.author: QueenAllen

customer_reviews.title: Truly a wide fit!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a wide boot as advertised. Outstanding fit. Could use a bit more cushion but an excellent fitting boot and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fit very small. Size up !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fit to these boots is very small. Which is a bit strange because I've had bearpaw boots in the past and didn't experience that. I would defiantly say size up , because I couldn't even get my foot into the boot with my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Elenaa

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: These boots are wonderful. Much better than UGGS & half the price. They are so comfortable & look great. I'm going to order more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: lorafair

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A little snug to pull on at first but is loosening up the more they're put on. Otherwise, fit is perfect and very comfotable. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kate L

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller after weeks
customer_reviews.text: These are the 4th pair of Bearpaws in the family and all have been great...except my pair. Trying to get in out of the slippers causes leg cramps because the ankle opening of the boot is disproportionate to the shoe size and calf. I thought they would stretch and they haven't. I could understand if I had large ankles but that's not the case. Contacted seller for an exchange but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: These warm and comfy boots are the best boots ever. They keep my feet so warm, even when it’s really cold outside. The flat sole adds to the comfort.along with the plush lining. These bear-paws are well made and Amazon offers them at a great price. This is my third pair!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I Love bear paws I’ve been buying them for years An excellent alternative to Uggs without the big price tag
customer_reviews.author: Grace B.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I love how the tread is actually rugged unlike previous bear paws where it's all flat with some grooves. So warm. So comfy. Love these boots more than my uggs
customer_reviews.author: Chelseaxxc

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I loved the gold color. These are not true gold, but rather a more tasteful version. They are comfy and cozy and I would order them again. The fit was pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have never ever had a problem with Amazon products when I have purchased them however these were a little off the stitching was off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I did go up a size (normally 7/7.5, ordered 8). Loved these and are holding up amazingly since purchase before Christmas. Wear daily in a warehouse/office setting and have had no issues. Very warm and love the way they look. Glad I finally purchases these.
customer_reviews.author: Swaney81

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Love these, the plastic in the heap broke like the second time I wore them, tags weren’t on the product in the box almost like they weren’t brand new maybe had been returned?
customer_reviews.author: Nhubbell

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The boots I saw was not what I got I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kim Deco.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: These boots are toasty warm, and the treads on the bottom are deep enough to be effective as slip prevention. I would give them 5 stars if they had arch support, but I added that myself with an after-market arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Max1000000

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas, because she wanted to take mine!! They look and fit great! She put them on as soon as she opened the box!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Orsag

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Women's Elle Short Winter Boot
product_meta.description: Our 8" classic suede boot on our new slimmed down construction with the great fit bear paw is known for. treated with "never wet" technology for extra protection from the elements. wool blend lining with sheepskin comfort footed on our new slim tread blown rubber outsole.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-calf from arch
